member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW
member.summary: TheMIB_UDP6ROW structure contains an entry from the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table for IPv6 on the local computer.

summary.para: The IPv6 address of the UDP endpoint on the local computer. This member is stored in a character array in network byte order.
A value of zero indicates a UDP listener willing to accept datagrams for any IP interface associated with the local computer.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW.dwLocalScopeId
member.summary: The scope ID for the IPv6 address of the UDP endpoint on the local computer. This member is stored in network byte order.

member.name: MIB_UDP6ROW.dwLocalPort
member.summary: The port number of the UDP endpoint on the local computer. This member is stored in network byte order.
